## CCSelectorCombinedProps.grid2ItemProps property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Props passed to the MUI Grid2 item components if the country code components are wrapped in such. Is overwritten by `grid2SelectorProps` and `grid2InputProps`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
grid2ItemProps?: Grid2ItemProps;
```
